item.title: Using Algolia with Hugo HBstack theme
item.description: TL;DR You can not find Hugo template on Algolia cause hugo is based on themes, and each theme uses different css styles. If you also use hbstack, here is my algolia crawler config you can refer to. 1new Crawler({ 2 appId: "xxxxxxxxx", // change to your appId 3 apiKey: "xxxxxxxxxx", // change to your apiKey 4 rateLimit: 8, 5 maxDepth: 10, 6 startUrls: ["https://travisbikkle.github.io/"], 7 // be careful with sitemaps below, it's related to you multi-lingual config in your hugo.
